SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface ViewInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ActualView, VirtualView
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUI, TUI, ViewTest, VirtualViewRMI, VirtualViewSocket
public interface ViewInterface extends Serializable, Remote
This interface represents the view of the game. This can be implemented by both a real View and a Virtual View. It has methods to update the view with the game state and to log messages.
